title: Hospital & Clinic Screenings
subtitle: Staff training sessions focused on improving patient care and awareness
description: Transform your healthcare team's understanding of maternal complications with our comprehensive hospital screening program. Designed specifically for medical staff, our sessions focus on patient safety, policy improvement, and trauma-informed care practices.

steps.title: Needs Assessment
steps.description: We evaluate your current training needs and identify specific areas where the screening can enhance your team's capabilities.

steps.title: Custom Program Design
steps.description: Develop a tailored screening program that aligns with your hospital's policies, procedures, and educational goals.

steps.title: Staff Training & Implementation
steps.description: Conduct the screening session with follow-up discussions, practical workshops, and ongoing support for implementation.
